reviews.comment: Interesting power-ups, would be an excellent game if touch-paddle was more responsive/accurate & didn\'t freeze. Uninstalled.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: This is absolutely horrible compared to the iPhone version. Don\'t waste your time or money with this crap.
